thoughtText: The Gemini personality is very fun, but, like every sign, Geminis have weaknesses. Their strengths are that they're adaptable, outgoing, and intelligentâ€”there's never a dull moment with a Gemini
The Bulls are complicated. They are both sweet and salty, being the loyal buddy and the sarcastic truth-teller at the same time. They are realistic but would take the leap of faith for their dreams.
Anyone with an Aries rising is brave and opinionated. They don't hold back their opinions, even when it's inappropriate to speak up.
